name: Electrician
description: Handles electrical wiring, installations, repairs, and maintenance for homes and offices.

name: Plumber
description: Fixes leaking pipes, installs water systems, and provides general plumbing repairs.

name: Tailor
description: Sews, adjusts, and repairs clothes to fit perfectly and look stylish.

name: Hair Stylist
description: Offers braiding, haircuts, coloring, and professional hair styling for all hair types.

name: Barber
description: Provides haircuts, beard trims, and grooming services for men and boys.

name: AC Technician
description: Specializes in installation, maintenance, and repair of air conditioning units.

name: Carpenter
description: Builds and repairs furniture, doors, wardrobes, and other wooden structures.

name: Painter
description: Paints homes, offices, gates, and interiors with a smooth, professional finish.

name: Mechanic
description: Repairs and services cars, bikes, and generators, offering diagnostics and maintenance.

name: Generator Repairer
description: Fixes and maintains small and large generators for homes and businesses.

name: Dry Cleaner
description: Offers washing, dry cleaning, ironing, and folding services with doorstep delivery.

name: Makeup Artist
description: Provides professional makeup services for weddings, birthdays, and special events.

name: Caregiver
description: Assists the elderly or sick with daily tasks, medical routines, and companionship.

name: Photographer
description: Captures special moments with professional photography for events, portraits, and weddings.

name: Videographer
description: Creates professional videos for weddings, corporate events, and promotional content.

name: Caterer

name: Driver Hire
description: Professional driving services for personal trips, corporate events, and special occasions.

name: Laptop Repair
description: Fixes laptop hardware issues, software problems, and provides maintenance services.

name: Smartphone Repair
description: Repairs mobile phones, tablets, and other electronic devices with quick turnaround.

name: CCTV Installation
description: Installs and maintains security camera systems for homes and businesses.

name: Solar Panel Installation
description: Installs solar power systems for homes and businesses to reduce electricity costs.

name: Locksmith

name: Refrigerator Repair
description: Fixes refrigerator cooling issues, compressor problems, and general maintenance.

name: Washing Machine Repair
description: Repairs washing machines, dryers, and other laundry appliances.

name: Nail Technician
description: Provides manicures, pedicures, nail art, and nail care services.

name: Website Design
description: Creates professional websites for businesses, portfolios, and e-commerce platforms.

name: Graphic Design
description: Designs logos, flyers, business cards, and marketing materials.

name: Event Planning
description: Organizes and coordinates weddings, parties, corporate events, and celebrations.

name: DJ

name: MC Host

name: Massage Therapy

description: Professional cleaning services for homes, offices, and commercial spaces.

name: Gardener

name: Security Guard
description: Provides security services for homes, offices, and events.

name: Tutor
description: Private tutoring services for students in various subjects and levels.

name: Translator
description: Professional translation services for documents, meetings, and communications.

description: Financial accounting, bookkeeping, and tax preparation services.

name: Lawyer

name: Doctor
description: Medical consultation, diagnosis, and treatment services.

name: Pharmacist

description: Personal errand services, task running, and assistance with daily tasks and deliveries.
